value.name: Ludhiana: 544 Khaki warriors infected in line of duty, three dead so far
value.description: At least 504 Ludhiana police personnel have already beaten coronavirus and 37 are still fighting the disease

value.name: Farmer, son shot dead over land dispute in Punjab’s Patran
value.description: A farmer, Balbir Singh, 58, and his son, Charanjeet Singh, 30, were murdered at Hamcheri village in Patran, 60km from Patiala, over a property dispute on Wednesday night

value.name: Delhi Police distributes immunity booster kits among staff
value.description: Delhi Police distributed the immunity booster kits amid the 2nd wave of the pandemic. Joint Commissioner of Police (New Delhi Range), Jaspal Singh handed over the kit among the staff. The kit comprised of Vitamin C tabs,

value.description: MP man, his son booked for property fraud in Panipat The police have booked a man and his son of Madhya Pradesh for allegedly duping JJP leader Devender Singh Kadyan, brother-in-law of Deputy Chief Minister Dushyant Singh Chautala,

value.name: Why UAPA cases fall flat in courts
value.description: Too stringent for bail, and too weak in court, we look at five judgements in courts that highlight the problem with the act

provider.name: The Times of India on MSN.com

value.name: Sikhs in Pakistan on verge of becoming extinct minority group
value.description: In 2019, Pakistan claimed positive global attention when it opened the Sikh gurdwara at Kartarpur to pilgrims from India. But the reality is that the Sikh community in Pakistan faces persistent discrimination.

provider.name: Middle East North Africa Financial Network

value.name: Mehat Pur villager arrested for illegal sand mining
value.description: The Nakodar Sadar police have arrested a Mehat Pur villager for transporting sand illegally. The investigating officer (IO) Manjit Singh said that the accused has been identified as Ravindar S Singh alias Kaka a resident of Bangiwal village under Mehat Pur police station.

value.name: Patran-based farmer, son shot dead over land dispute
value.description: The police said a case had been registered against Balbir’s brother Karnail Singh, his mother Balwinder Kaur, his nephews Khuvinder Singh and Gurpal Singh, besides his friend Jaspal Singh under Section 302 (Murder) and 120-B (Criminal conspiracy ...
